道議選: (どうぎせん) - Hokkaido Prefectural Assembly elections
道路上: (どうろじょう) - on the road
道路交通情報通信システム: (どうろこうつうじょうほうつうしんシステム) - VICS; Vehicle Information and Communication Systems
道路交通法: (どうろこうつうほう) - Road Traffic Law
道路工事: (どうろこうじ) - road construction; roadworks; road repairs
道路掃除人: (どうろそうじじん) - street sweeper (person)
道路整備: (どうろせいび) - road maintenance; road improvement
道路標示: (どうろひょうじ) - traffic sign painted on the road
道路標識: (どうろひょうしき) - road sign; signpost
道路特定財源: (どうろとくていざいげん) - revenue source set aside for road construction
道路網: (どうろもう) - road network; highway network; highway network system
道路運送車両法: (どうろうんそうしゃりょうほう) - Road Transport Vehicle Law
道連れ: (みちづれ) - fellow traveler/fellow traveller; someone unwillingly made to take part/being made to take part in something
道連れにする: (みちづれにする) - to make take part in some activity; to take along with you (w. negative associations)
道道: (みちみち) - along the way; along the road
道長: (どうちょう) - head of a martial arts organization (organisation)
道陸神: (どうろくじん) - traveler's guardian deity (traveller)
達: (tatsu) - attain , pluralizing suffix (especialmente para pessoas e animais; anteriormente honorífico)
達す: (たっす) - to reach; to get to
達する: (たっする) - to reach; to get to; to arrive at
達て: (たって) - strongly hoping or requesting (of something that is difficult to be brought to fruition)
達引く: (たてひく) - to compete with each other (e.g. out of pride, obstinacy, etc.)
達成のレベル: (たっせいのレベル) - level of performance
達成感: (たっせいかん) - sense of accomplishment
達磨: (ダルマ) - daruma/tumbling doll/round, red-painted good-luck doll in the shape of Bodhidharma, with a blank eye to be completed when a person's wish is granted; Bodhidharma; prostitute
達磨さんがころんだ: (だるまさんがころんだ) - children's game similar to Statues or Red Light Green Light; Bodhidharma fell down
達磨さんが転んだ: (だるまさんがころんだ) - children's game similar to Statues or Red Light Green Light; Bodhidharma fell down
達磨宗: (だるましゅう) - Zen (Buddhism); confusing style of middle-age Japanese poetry
達磨忌: (だるまき) - ceremony held in honor (honour) of Bodhidharma (October 5th)
達磨歌: (だるまうた) - confusing song or poem (esp. used derogatorily to describe a style of middle-age Japanese poetry popularized by Fujiwara no Teika)
達磨鮫: (ダルマザメ) - cookie-cutter shark (Isistius brasiliensis); cigar shark
達筆: (たっぴつ) - skillful writing; speedy writing
達者: (たっしゃ) - in good health/healthy/well/robust/strong; skilled/clever/proficient
達観: (たっかん) - taking a philosophic view; looking at the long term/farsightedness
違いない: (ちがいない) - (phrase) sure; no mistaking it; for certain
違い棚: (ちがいだな) - set of staggered shelves
違い無い: (ちがいない) - (phrase) sure; no mistaking it; for certain
違い箸: (ちがいばし) - using two different chopsticks together (a breach of etiquette)
違う: (chigau) - to differ (de), to vary; to not be in the usual condition , to differ (from), to vary; to not be in the usual condition; to not match the correct (answer, etc.); to be different from promised
違える: (ちがえる) - to change/to alter; to mistake/to make a mistake; to fail to keep (e.g. one's promise); to dislocate (e.g. one's neck)
違作: (いさく) - smaller harvest than expected; poor crop; bad harvest; crop failure
違勅: (いちょく) - disobeying the emperor's order
違反切符: (いはんきっぷ) - ticket (e.g. for a traffic violation)
違反車: (いはんしゃ) - violating vehicles (esp. vehicles violating parking regulations)
違和感: (iwakan) - sensação de desconforto, sentir-se deslocado, sensação de incômodo; mal-estar, mal-estar físico
違憲立法審査権: (いけんりっぽうしんさけん) - judicial review
違棚: (ちがいだな) - set of staggered shelves
違法コピー: (いほうコピー) - illegal copy; pirate copy
違法ダウンロード: (いほうダウンロード) - illegal downloading (e.g. of copyrighted works)
違法ドラッグ: (いほうドラッグ) - (term formerly used by government bodies, e.g. the Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare)  law-evading drug (e.g. amyl nitrates, MiPT); quasi-legal drug; designer drug
違法性阻却事由: (いほうせいそきゃくじゆう) - justifiable cause for noncompliance with the law
違法所持: (いほうしょじ) - illegal possession; unlawful possession
